entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
